page.title: 15EVENTS ON CLEE HILL
page.content: On the 1st. Tuesday of every month,{The Women's Institute}meet. They do some charity work, and raise money by holding rummage sales and playing bingo. They also have a darts team, who play every week, on a Wednesday. On the 3rd. Monday of every month,{The Mothers' Union}meet. They help the church, and have talks given by vicars and social workers. For the over 60s, there is{The {Sunshine Club,}which meets every Thursday. They play bingo, have talks, parties and go on trips. Every Thursday, there is a{Whist {Drive}in the village. At intervals, there are{bingo games, coffee {evenings, disco dances, supper dances} and{rummage sales.} For the under 5s, there is a{ {play_group.}This is held every Monday, Wednesday and Thursday mornings.
